section.p: Not even the greatest knight in the world could fight ten well-trained opponents at the same time. Your sword pierces the stomach of the first man, but you are too slow to parry the attack of the guard right behind him. Lose 2-12 Stamina points (the roll of two dice).

Your only chance is to feign death.
Make a MAGIC roll at a Difficulty of 15
to temporarily stop your own heart. If you don’t manage to fool them, they will cut you to ribbons!
